mapper.sql: infoId, gender, tel, workNumber, email, workingPlace, age, hireDate, description, positionId, _id, isDelete
mapper.select:
select
from userInfo where infoId = #{infoid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and isDelete = 0

select alf.icNumber,alf.idNumber,alf.type,alf.userName,alf.birthDay,alf.prompt, info.gender,info.tel,info.workNumber,info.email,info.workingPlace,info.age,info.hireDate,info.description, g.groupName from alfuserlibrary alf left join userInfo info on alf._id = info._id left join _group g on alf.groupId = g._id where info.isDelete = 0 and alf.type = 0 and alf._id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into userInfo (infoId, gender, tel, workNumber, email, workingPlace, age, hireDate, description, positionId, _id, isDelete) values (#{infoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workingplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hiredate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into userInfo
infoId,
gender,
tel,
workNumber,
email,
workingPlace,
age,
hireDate,
description,
positionId,
_id,
isDelete,

mapper.update:
update userInfo
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
workNumber = #{worknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
workingPlace = #{workingplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hireDate = #{hiredate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
positionId = #{positionid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isDelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where infoId = #{infoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update userInfo set gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workNumber = #{worknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workingPlace = #{workingplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hireDate = #{hiredate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, positionId = #{positionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, _id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} isDelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} where infoId = #{infoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
